title: Sophisticated Haven In A Premium Lifestyle Enclave - 8920 NE 13th St
posting_body: Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location
A fantastic opportunity, this home features a classic interior and comes complete with generous living spaces.
Sized for spacious comfort, the spacious master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and access to a balcony.
The glamorous master bathroom includes a separate shower, soaking tub, and double sinks.
This home is also equipped with central air-conditioning and heating.

Take advantage of this spacious home that is built with an enormous recreation room, a laundry room with a washer and dryer, a family room, a utility and storage room, and a home office with an ensuite bathroom.
You'll enjoy being in the enormous backyard which boasts a covered deck and rolling green lawn.
A place where wonderful memories are made.
Set on a quiet street in a tranquil section of King County.
Keep your vehicles clean and dry with a spacious 3-car attached garage.
Pets on a case-by-case basis only.
Be prepared for 'love at first sight'.
See this one quickly or miss a great home.
** Tenant pays for electricity, water, gas, garbage, and cable/internet.
** Security Deposit is equal to 1x the monthly rent based upon approved credit.
(NOTE: In WA, security deposits have a maximum cap at 1x rent.
Allowed to have a separate and additional refundable Pet Damage Deposit equal to 25% of the monthly rent)
